## golab group

Manage Gitlab Groups

### Synopsis


Show, create, update and delete Gitlab groups.

```
golab group
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   (optional) CURRENTLY NOT SUPPORTED config file (default is ./.golab.yml and $HOME/.golab.yml)
```
